title: Drawing, "Front Elevation of a House for Mr. John Gregory", 1807–10
medium: Graphite; pen and black ink; brush and gray, green and yellow wash on off white wove paper
inscribed:
In pen and brown ink: Design for Improving the Entrance Front.
Inscribed in graphite: of Mr. Gregory's House / John Gregory Cheyne Walk Chelsea.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Front elevation of a house. Inscription in brown ink below image.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Front Elevation of a House for Mr. John Gregory", 1807–10.
1807–10. Graphite; pen and black ink; brush and gray, green and yellow wash on off white wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1948-40-108.
